channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's higher tariffs take effect today. And, a sergeant opened fire at Fort Stewart
item.description: President Trump's higher import taxes take effect today, impacting several countries. And, the sergeant who opened fire at Fort Stewart, injuring five...

item.title: Ultra-processed food consumption is down a bit, but still more than 50% of U.S. diet
item.description: Americans get about 55% of our calories from tasty, cheap — and unhealthy — manufactured foods, the latest data from CDC says. For kids, the percentag...

item.title: Trump calls for U.S. census to exclude for the first time people with no legal status
item.description: Trump is calling for a "new" census that excludes people in the U.S. without legal status. The 14th Amendment requires the "whole number of persons in...

item.title: Scientists find a planet from the Avatar movies in real life
item.description: One of the brightest stars in the night sky seems to be orbited by a planet like Jupiter. The news is sure to cheer fans of the Avatar series, which c...

item.title: Federal judge rules cuts to humanities grants were 'unlawful'

item.title: NOAA updates its 2025 Atlantic hurricane season forecast
item.description: Two months into the 2025 Atlantic hurricane season, NOAA forecasters updated their prediction for how many tropical storms and hurricanes to expect.

item.title: Why Trump-Putin talks unlikely to bring rapid end to Ukraine war
item.description: Even with Trump's direct involvement, Moscow's preconditions for a ceasefire in Ukraine make a swift ending to the bloodshed difficult to reach.

item.title: Lady A's Charles Kelley on influences behind his new sound as he releases second solo album

item.title: Tears and outrage in South Africa as accused in pig farm murder walks free
item.description: Adrian de Wet says he was forced to throw the bodies of two black women into the pig enclosure.

item.title: Democrats seek more info on DOGE's presence in agencies after Musk's exit
item.description: A group of Democrats in Congress is seeking to stop Department of Government Efficiency employees from moving into permanent positions in the federal ...

item.title: Texas Democrats plea for donations to extend their walkout and block Trump’s redistricting plan
Trump's sweeping new tariffs take effect against dozens of countries
item.description: The president also hit India with a 50% tariff and threatened a 100% levy on foreign-made computer chips.

item.title: Zambia dismisses US health warning after toxic spill in copper mining area
item.description: Zambia's government says the water is safe to drink after the US embassy ordered its staff to withdraw.

item.title: Ex-Superman actor says he's becoming ICE agent
item.description: Dean Cain says he'll be "sworn in as an ICE agent asap" following a recruitment drive by the agency.
